column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is undoubtably the best bakery & breakfast spot in Houston. We pull out all the stops every time we visit--as in two breakfast orders
column3: and a latte or two. The chef's scramble is our go to-everything included is a 10/10. We got the French toast as well today
column4: and while it was pretty sweet (lots of syrup included) it was absolutely delicious and the Chantilly cream and bacon were great additions. Our favorite pastries: almond croissant
column6: and macarons. Make sure to visit earlier in the morning
column7: the line gets long and they run out of popular pastries!
